thread.title: Saudis: 107 dead in crane collapse at Mecca's Grand Mosque
thread.title_full: Saudis: 107 dead in crane collapse at Mecca's Grand Mosque - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Saudis: 107 dead in crane collapse at Mecca's Grand Mosque
text:
By ABDULLAH AL-SHIHRI and ADAM SCHRECK
Associated Press RIYADH, Saudi Arabia (AP) - Saudi authorities have raised the death toll in a construction crane collapse at Mecca's Grand Mosque to 107.
The country's civil defense authority tweeted early Saturday that 238 people were injured in Friday's accident, which occurred ahead of the start of the annual hajj pilgrimage later this month.
Mecca is Islam's holiest site.
Images aired on Saudi state television have shown the crane's metal boom smashed through what appeared to be the roof of the mosque.
